nodes.text: The Hylobon Enforcers were the personal guards of Dryden Vos, public leader of the Crimson Dawn crime syndicate. They were made up of members of the Hylobon species and armed with JND-41 percussive cannons.
On the planet Vandor, the enforcers were present on Dryden Vos' yacht First Light, where Beckett's gang was forced to give up their weapons to enforcer Aemon Gremm before a meeting with Vos.

On Savareen, the enforcer Toht Ra took weapons from Qi'ra and Han Solo before their meeting with Vos. Later, the enforcers were commanded by Vos to storm the Pnakotic Coast village in search of coaxium. However, they only found villagers dressed in the armor of the Cloud-Riders. Distracted, the Hylobon Enforcers were ambushed by the Cloud-Riders. Some enforcers, including Gremm, were killed, while others are disarmed and subdued. Two other guards, who were with Dryden Vos, were killed by Tobias Beckett.
The Hylobon Enforcers made their first appearance in the mobile game Star Wars: Force Arena.
